entry.name: scrindex
entry.caption: Make index package work with Koma-script classes.
entry.description:
This package redefines environment `theindex' of package `index', if a class from KOMA-Script is loaded. Also option `idxtotoc' is supported. Index preambles can be given either by means of package `index' or via the interface provided by KOMA-Script.
The package is part of the oberdiek bundle.
